items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater.
items.body: I’ve bought two of these sweaters. The material is thick and warm and the bell sleeves add an elegant style. Feels high quality for such a good price. Read more
items.author: Annie Bushey

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs a size small
items.body: This runs a on the small size which is oaky if you want a fitted look and don’t plan on wearing a thick sweater under it - otherwise order a size up. It is trendy, looks good, and it is warm. Read more
items.author: mcclungwv

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and cozy
items.body: The fabric on this is really cozy and thick. The shape of it is flattering to the waist and the sleeves add interest and volume to the silhouette. I wish it came in more colors! Read more
items.author: Jeanne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely and expensive looking sweater
items.body: Beautiful sweater and a similar look to a much more expensive version I had been eyeing!! Paired it with a silk maxi skirt, tights and boots. Material is lovely and feels durable. Read more
items.author: Grace

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering and good quality dupe for a high end one!
items.body: Dupe for the high end one i bought all 3 colors ,its really nicely made.I am very impressed Read more
items.author: Andrea

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy
items.body: The buttons are impossibly hard to use. The button whole is too small for yhe large button. I wish the sweater was an inch or two longer but it is very comfy I love the bell sleeves they are a good length. Read more
items.author: sos219

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and thick cardigan with bell cuffs
items.body: The Amazon Essentials Womens Regular-Fit Long-Sleeve Cardigan with Bell Sleeves and Shaped Waist is a differently shaped cardigan. This soft sweater has a subtle hourglass shape to it. The product page says that this cardigan has bell sleeves. I wouldn't call the sleeves bell sleeves. They're more like bell cuffs. The sleeves fit as usual, until they get to the elbow, when then begin to softly flare. By the time you get to the cuff, the sleeves are about 3 times as wide as the rest of the sleeve. While I like the sweater, I think that it's best for people who live in areas where they won't need to wear a coat on top of a cardigan. Perhaps in areas where people can get by with only a cape or Poncho on top of their cardigan. Mainly, because I don't know how anyone would get the cuff through the sleeve of a coat. If you live in an area where a coat is required for winter, then, you'll probably need to keep this cardigan set aside for transitional weather when a coat isn't required. This sweater is soft. It's a pretty thick cardigan, in my opinion. But, I've spent the majority of my life in Texas, where we rarely need a coat for more than a week at a time. Other than not being able to get a coat on while wearing this cardigan, the only thing that I dread is the fact that it's supposed to be dried laying flat. I'm not sure that I would've ordered this cardigan if it had registered in my brain that it had to be dried laying flat. As much as I dread having to dry it laying flat, it's not enough to make me return this cardigan, or donate it. I'm definitely keeping this cardigan. I do recommend it. (My star rating system: 4 stars met my expectations, 5 stars exceeded my expectations, 3 stars fell short of my expectations, 2 stars significantly fell short of my expectations, 1 star highly suggest not ordering) Read more
items.author: Annie48

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Comfortable and Mostly Cotton
items.body: This AMAZON ESSENTIALS sweater could easily become a fall and winter foundation piece to one’s wardrobe. It is nice looking. The bell sleeve and tapered in waistline give this sweater a fashion flair that elevates it beyond just a basic black sweater. It has a tidy professional look when it’s buttoned up and unbuttoned moves into a casual look. There are two front pockets just above the bottom band. A cell phone will fit into the pockets with pat of the phone sticking out of the top. The sweater has nice looking buttons down the front. They have a dark horn-like look. There is an extra button sewn on the care tag, which I appreciate in case I lose a button. I am a big cotton fan for comfort. I definitely can tell there’s cotton in this fabric. It’s super soft, breathes well, and feels good against the skin. The sweater is warm and cozy. It wicks moisture which will keep me from feeling overheated in this sweater. The care instructions say machine wash in cold water and lay flat to air dry. The sweater is good quality in design, fabric, and construction. The price is lower than I would expect for a sweater of this quality. I hope more colors are added in the future. For reference to the photo I am wearing a medium. I’m 5’4” and 135 lbs. I am a size 8 and usually wear mediums. If you’re unsure about what size to get I’d suggest size up, meaning if you’re between an 8 and 10 go for a large, especially if you plan to layer this over a top. Read more
items.author: Momof3

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Oatmeal Heather, Light Grey Heather, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
